fellowship_title: Postdoctoral Fellowships at University of Oxford
comments: A Danish university or other public, non-profit research institution in Denmark (Danish Host Institution) must employ the applicant and administer the fellowship for the entirety of the grant period.
Candidates cannot apply for a fellowship to work in the country of their nationality.
Projects not based in Denmark are awarded only to Danish applicants.
